data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Heim, Isabel, Nickel, Michael (2010): Description and molecular phylogeny of Tethya leysae sp. nov. (Porifera, Demospongiae, Hadromerida) from the Canadian Northeast Pacific with remarks on the use of microtomography in sponge taxonomy. Zootaxa 2422: 1-21, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.194503
